trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around February 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile walking in Olde City Philadelphia I noticed a very star like object to the Southwest direction above the buildings to my left. As A watcher of the sky I took notice to the fact that it was moving slowly. I quickly observed that it did not have any strobe lights that would indicate it was an airplane. The object continued to move in a NNE direction and I had to cross to the west side of the street to continue observation it. Once it passed overhead it continued to be visible. Suddenly the light dimmed and dissapeared. This reminded me of pass overs of satellites, for which I checked and saw that a passover of SkyLab1 happened at 7;04 but did not coordinate to this objects brightness (as I was dealing with citylights) and direction. Very interesting indeed!
Summary: While walking up walking third street near Market St. in Olde City I noticed a very bright like star object. Continued on a straight line path to almost directly overhead and then dimmed and dissapeared.
